comments:
I tried to import projects all of the plugins installed in my standard 20020214 
installation.  I unchecked the 'Copy plug-in contents...' option.  I got two 
dialogs with the following error in them, and the projects were not succesfully 
imported.

I exited and restarted Eclipse, and now my workspace is really messed up.  It 
looks like the PDE has created invalid projects, because the Packages view and 
the Navigator have both stopped working.  They appear to be getting similar 
walkbacks.

This is a known problem that has since been fixed but you cannot use it yet 
because there was no integration build last week. 

As a workaround, turn off Binary project decorator from 'Window->Decorators'.
